hero.subtitle: Welcome To LC
hero.Title: Welcome To The Lion Construction
Desc: We offer end-to-end construction services tailored to your needs. We’re ready to help bring your vision to life.

aboutSectionOne.subtitle: About Us
aboutSectionOne.Title: Best Construction Company in Chennai
descriptions: At Lion Construction, we take pride in being one of the best construction company in Chennai, trusted by homeowners and businesses alike. With years of experience, we deliver strong, long-lasting buildings that match your vision and budget. As a reliable construction company in Chennai, we handle every step from planning to completion   with care and precision.

If you're looking for a professional and transparent construction company Chennai, choose LC. We build homes, offices, and commercial spaces with high quality, on-time delivery, and clear communication. Ready to build something great? Contact us today for a free consultation.

titleSectionData.subTitle: Our Approach
titleSectionData.title: Clear and Simple Steps to Building Your Dream Home

list.title: Fill Out the Inquiry Form
list.shortDescription: Complete the form with your details so we can understand your requirements.

list.title: Consultation Call
list.shortDescription: Our architect will contact you to talk about your project and answer any questions you have.

list.title: Site Visit & Analysis
list.shortDescription: Our project team and senior architect will visit your site to study it carefully.

list.title: Quotation & Terms
list.shortDescription: We will provide a detailed quote including specifications and payment options.

list.title: Booking & Agreement
list.shortDescription: Confirm your booking by paying Rs. 2.5 lakhs and signing the construction agreement.

list.title: Design & Approval
list.shortDescription: We start the design and approval process to prepare everything for construction.

list.title: Construction Begins
list.shortDescription: Sit back and relax while we start building your dream home with care.

processSteps.title: Agreement Signing
processSteps.description: The agreement signing is when the client and construction company officially agree on the project details. This step ensures both sides know their duties, terms, and rules, helping the project run smoothly.

processSteps.title: Soil Testing
processSteps.description: Soil testing checks the ground before building begins. It finds out the soil type and strength to make sure the foundation is safe and strong. This helps avoid future problems with the building.

processSteps.title: Project Kickoff
processSteps.description: The project kickoff marks the official beginning of the construction work. It brings together clients, builders, and team members to celebrate and discuss the project goals. It helps everyone stay motivated and focused.

processSteps.title: Column Planning
processSteps.description: Column planning involves deciding where to place columns in the building. Proper placement is important for keeping the building stable and strong, while allowing open spaces inside.

processSteps.title: Excavation and Foundation Work
processSteps.description: This step involves digging for the columns and building their foundations. It’s important to do this well to make sure the columns can support the entire building safely.

processSteps.title: Roof Support Setup
processSteps.description: Roof support setup means building temporary structures that hold the concrete roof until it hardens. This ensures the roof keeps its shape and is strong once finished.

processSteps.title: Concrete Roof Pouring
processSteps.description: Pouring concrete for the roof slab must be done carefully to ensure it spreads evenly and sets properly. A strong roof slab adds safety and comfort to the building.

processSteps.title: Partition Walls
processSteps.description: Partition walls divide the inside space into rooms. They provide privacy and reduce noise. Proper installation helps create comfortable and useful living areas.

processSteps.title: Flooring, Electrical & Plumbing
processSteps.description: This phase includes laying floors, wiring electricity, and installing water pipes. Doing these tasks properly is key to making the home safe and comfortable.

processSteps.title: Extras Installation
processSteps.description: Adding features like solar water heaters, pools, elevators, and safety systems improves the building’s comfort and usability. Good safety systems protect the people inside.

processSteps.title: Doors, Windows & Fixtures
processSteps.description: Proper installation of doors, windows, and fittings boosts both security and energy efficiency. Choosing good materials and styles also makes the home look better.

processSteps.title: Outdoor & Entrance Design
processSteps.description: Designing the entrance and outdoor areas creates a welcoming look and makes the property functional. Good landscaping and pathways add beauty and ease of access.

processSteps.title: Handover & Celebration
processSteps.description: When the project is done, the keys are handed over to the client. This special moment marks the start of new memories in their new home, celebrating a successful build.

tabItems.title: Site Planning
tabItems.description: We start by creating a detailed site plan that fits your land and meets all regulations, making sure every inch is used well.

tabItems.title: Building Layout
tabItems.description: Next, we design the building layout, planning rooms and spaces to match your needs and lifestyle.

tabItems.title: 3D Partial Design
tabItems.description: We create 3D partial models so you can see how key parts of the building will look before moving forward.

tabItems.title: Structural Drawings
tabItems.description: Our engineers prepare strong structural drawings to ensure your building will be safe and stable.

tabItems.title: 3D Elevation Design
tabItems.description: We design 3D elevations to show the outside look of your building from every angle.

tabItems.title: Approval Drawings
tabItems.description: Detailed drawings are prepared and submitted for approval from local authorities, ensuring the project meets all rules.

tabItems.title: 3D Interior Designs
tabItems.description: Finally, we create realistic 3D interior designs so you can visualize your rooms and decor before construction begins.
